import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../Styles/Chat.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faComment } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function OpenChatBtn() { const [openChat, setOpenChat] = useState(false); return (
{ if (openChat) { setOpenChat(false) } else setOpenChat(true) }} >

Live Chat

) }
